project_descr: The programme is fostered to facilitate the transition of all Kosovo Protection Corps members not joining the new force towards new civilian life occupations.

outputs.output_descr:
To facilitate the effective transition of former Kosovo Protection Corps Members not selected into the new Kosovo Security Force into viable civilian occupations.

The same output prevails for the Project ID 00063666 - the "Component B" of the KPC RP is implemented by a major local implementing partner who provides reintegration assistance (NGO Implementation).
To facilitate the effective transition of former Kosovo Protection Corps Members not selected into the new Kosovo Security Force into viable civilian occupations.
